version_description:
- Streaming should now work properly with QuickSync encoder
- Fixes and improvements for various stability issues

- Streaming should now work properly with QuickSync encoder
- Fixes and improvements for various stability issues

- GameWarp feature - use your VR equipment to play non-VR games.
- Added gamma correction.
Read more at blog.riftcat.com.

- GameWarp feature - use your VR equipment to play non-VR games.
- Added gamma correction.
Read more at blog.riftcat.com.

-App and connection stability was improved
-Connection should now be restored noticeably faster in case of disconnection

-App and connection stability was improved
-Connection should now be restored noticeably faster in case of disconnection

- Improved picture compression quality.
- Improved color accuracy, especially in dark scenes.
- Reduced latency on Nvidia cards.
- Implemented multiple ways to reduce mid-stream artifacting.

- Improved picture compression quality.
- Improved color accuracy, especially in dark scenes.
- Reduced latency on Nvidia cards.
- Implemented multiple ways to reduce mid-stream artifacting.
- Error correction should now correctly adapt to network conditions.
- Error correction should now correctly adapt to network conditions.
Settings button is now working correctly.
Settings button is now working correctly.
Streaming should now work correctly with Forward Error Correction enabled.
Streaming should now work correctly with Forward Error Correction enabled.
Stability improvements mainly for initial configuration.
Stability improvements mainly for initial configuration.
